briefdescription.para: Custom ID for the modal form.
Title of the modal form box (max 25 characters)
List of components. All components must be placed within an action row, each outer vector is the action row.
Response type from dpp::interaction_response_type. Should be one of ir_pong, ir_channel_message_with_source, or ir_deferred_channel_message_with_source.
Message tied to this response.
Array of up to 25 autocomplete choices.
Fill object properties from JSON.
Build a json for this object.
Construct a new interaction modal response object.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &_custom_id, const std::string &_title, const std::vector< component > _components={})
memberdef.name: interaction_modal_response

briefdescription.para: Construct a new interaction modal response object.

parameterdescription.para: Custom ID of the modal form
Title of the modal form. It will be truncated to the maximum length of 45 UTF-8 characters.
Components to add to the modal form

briefdescription.para: Set the custom id.
Set the title.

simplesect.para: A modal response can have a maximum of five rows.

parameterdescription.para: if more than five rows are attempted to be added

briefdescription.para: Destroy the interaction modal response object.
Add a command option choice.

briefdescription.para: Represents a modal dialog box response to an interaction.

detaileddescription.para: A dialog box is a modal popup which appears to the user instead of a message. One or more components are displayed on a form (the same component structure as within a dpp::message). When the user submits the form an on_form_submit event is dispatched to any listeners.
